description: This roasted mushroom, blue cheese and lentil dish makes a rich and satisfying vegetarian main course.

name: Roasted Mushrooms with Blue Cheese & Garlic Lentils Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 medium red onions, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, place the mushrooms stem side up on a baking tray surrounded by red onion wedges, drizzle with half of the oil and half of the garlic. Roast for 25 minutes.

Add the rest of the oil to a pan on medium high heat and cook the thyme sprigs and remaining garlic for 3 minutes to infuse the oil. Remove the thyme, stir in the lentils, kale and balsamic and cook for 3 minutes, until the kale is wilted and the lentils are hot.
Serve each mushroom piled with lentils, roasted red onions and dotted with gorgonzola.
